scripts.build: yarn run build-css && yarn run build-js && yarn run build-jekyll
scripts.build-css: node-sass --include-path node_modules _sass --source-map true --output-style compressed --output css && postcss --use autoprefixer --replace css/**/*.css --no-map
scripts.build-js: mkdir -p js/build/global-nav && cp node_modules/@canonical/global-nav/dist/global-nav.js js/build/global-nav && mkdir -p js/build/lazysizes && cp node_modules/lazysizes/lazysizes.min.js js/build/lazysizes
scripts.clean: rm -rf node_modules yarn-error.log css js *.log *.sqlite _site/ build/ .jekyll-metadata .bundle
